pr_title: fix(iot-dev): Fix module client so it doesn't need to set urlStreamFactoryHandler

timeline.message:
fix(iot-dev): Fix module client so it doesn't need to set urlStreamFactoryHandler

setting the factory handler sometimes failed if this library was used alongside other libraries that set the same handler because that handler can only be set once per jvm session

fix(iot-dev): Fix module client so it doesn't need to set urlStreamFactoryHandler

setting the factory handler sometimes failed if this library was used alongside other libraries that set the same handler because that handler can only be set once per jvm session

refactor(edge-e2e): Add regression protection on setURLStreamHandlerFactory

setURLStreamHandlerFactory used to be called in module client code, but now it doesn't. See comments in code for more details

refactor(edge-e2e): Add regression protection on setURLStreamHandlerFactory

setURLStreamHandlerFactory used to be called in module client code, but now it doesn't. See comments in code for more details

timeline.bodyText: So with new changes, description of this method should also change?
timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: which part of the javadoc header is out of date here?
